user_query: I want to surprise my family with a weekend getaway and I need some destination recommendations. Can you suggest some popular family-friendly destinations with nearby attractions? Additionally, I would like to know the nutritional information for a dish called 'Pasta Primavera' to ensure it aligns with our dietary preferences.

TaskList.description: Research popular family-friendly getaway destinations and their nearby attractions.
Gather detailed information about the attractions of the suggested destinations.
Look up the nutritional information for 'Pasta Primavera'.
